actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain land of the United States shall be held by the United States in trust or certain communities of the Mdewakanton Sioux in Minnesota.

summary.text: Provides that specified lands of the United States shall be held in trust for specified communities of the Mdewakanton Sioux of Minnesota and shall be included in and considered a part of the reservation lands of such communities. States that no provision of this Act shall be construed to affect any contract, lease, or assignment in existence on the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain land of the United States shall be held by the United States in trust or certain communities of the Mdewakanton Sioux in Minnesota.
